project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement the main game loop and structure
Define the questions and answers variable
Implement input handling for user's choices
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
